response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item offers unparalleled functionality and quality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to enhance their operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and market positioning, we believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Considering the investment required to develop and refine this product, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This special offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-end solution at a premium price. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
